message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $150. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you halfway just yet. I'm willing to come down to $140, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $140. Would you be willing to meet me at $130?
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $135, but that's my final offer. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $125?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $135, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway between $125 and $135, which is $130. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $130. This is my final offer.
